tool_description: Records detailed injury information including type, severity, body parts affected, medical treatment provided, and potential long-term impacts for workplace incidents.

incident_id.description: Unique identifier of the incident report

injured_person_name.description: Full name of the injured person

injury_severity.description: Overall severity assessment: minor, moderate, major, critical

workers_compensation_claim.description: Whether workers compensation claim will be filed

error_messages: Invalid incident ID: Provide a valid incident_id that exists in the system.
Missing injured person name: injured_person_name is required and must be at least 2 characters.
Invalid injury severity: Use one of [minor, moderate, major, critical].
Inconsistent medical information: If medical_treatment_required is true, treatment_location should be provided.
Invalid recovery estimate: estimated_recovery_days must be between 0 and 365.
Empty injury arrays: injury_types and body_parts_affected cannot be empty.
Invalid injury type: Use recognized injury types (cut, bruise, fracture, burn, sprain, strain, laceration, concussion, other).
Invalid body part: Use recognized body parts (head, neck, back, arm, leg, hand, foot, torso, eye, other).
usage: Provide incident_id, injured_person_name, injury_types, body_parts_affected, injury_severity, and medical_treatment_required. Include additional medical and recovery information as available to create comprehensive injury documentation.

injury_record_id.description: Unique identifier for this injury assessment

lost_time_injury.description: Whether this qualifies as lost time injury
